class.name: CubeMap
class.brief_description: A CubeMap is a 6 sided 3D texture.
class.description: A 6-sided 3D texture typically used for faking reflections. It can be used to make an object look as if it's reflecting its surroundings. This usually delivers much better performance than other reflection methods.

method.name: get_flags
method.description: Returns the render flags for the [code]CubeMap[/code]. See the [code]FLAG_*[/code] constants for details.

method.name: get_side
method.description: Returns an [Image] for a side of the [code]CubeMap[/code] using one of the [code]SIDE_*[/code] constants or an integer 0-5.

method.name: set_flags
method.description: Returns the render flags for the [code]CubeMap[/code]. See the [code]FLAG_*[/code] constants for details.

method.name: set_side
method.description: Sets an [Image] for a side of the [code]CubeMap[/code] using one of the [code]SIDE_*[/code] constants or an integer 0-5.
